docs.lead_paragraph: Michelle Obama draws criticism and praise not only for her advocacy for nutrition but also for TV push-ups, the “mom dance” and the Oscars.

headline.main: New Attention to First Lady as She Presses Ahead With Healthy Eating Drive
headline.print_headline: New Attention to First Lady as She Presses Ahead With Healthy Eating Drive

docs.abstract: Michelle Obama, who has drawn both praise and criticism for her campaign aimed at reducing nation's obesity rate and helping children eat better, begins new three-city tour to promote new federal school lunch policies.
docs.snippet: Michelle Obama draws criticism and praise not only for her advocacy for nutrition but also for TV push-ups, the “mom dance” and the Oscars.

headline.main: Monday Reading: Why Junk Food Is So Addictive

docs.abstract: Why junk food is so addictive, hostels go upscale, fitness at a price of your choosing and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
docs.snippet: Why junk food is so addictive, hostels go upscale, fitness at a price of your choosing and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
